subtitle: A simple cake to make using basic store cupboard ingredients.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly grease and line a 1 kg loaf tin.
Mix all the flours and sugars together. Rub in butter until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs.
Stir chopped prunes and orange rind into the orange juice. Add to flour mixture, beating well together.
Add egg and vanilla essence and nuts. Turn into the loaf tin.
Bake for 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> - 1 days or until well risen and cooked through.
Leave to cool in the tin before turning out onto a cooling tray.

title: Orange prune nut bread
